==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|[[wārumbe]], [[wārumme]]}}, from {{inh|de|goh|wār umbe}}. Equivalent to {{com|de|wo|t1=where|um|t2=about, around, at}}, thus originally “about what”. Doublet of {{m|de|worum}}, but with the older vocalism preserved. Compare {{cog|nl|waarom}}, which has both meanings. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/vaˈʁʊm/}} {{q|usual}} * {{IPA|de|/ˈvaː.ʁʊm/}} {{q|never in isolation, but sometimes triggered by the intonation of a sentence}} * {{rhymes|de|ʊm}} ===Adverb=== {{de-adv}} # [[why]]; for what reason ===See also=== * {{l|de|weshalb}} * {{l|de|weswegen}} * {{l|de|wieso}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:German interrogative adverbs]]
